divs: sighting detailsi was about to leave my parents house when i finished babysitting when my sister said "look at those lights" so ke my mom and dad, my fiancee and my uncle and two cousins looked up and watched these red-orange lights travel from the southern part of las vegas towards where i was on the west side of las vegas. they went straight and then dissapeared in the clouds i had a dream about that same event that morning everthing in my dream happened except the part where i was abducted. i recorded it hard to see but you can see the red dots of them im not to sure what to believe if it was a ufo or something else but this is about the 3rd time in the past 12 years i have lived in las vegas. i cannot upload my video here i am using my phone but you can go to my youtube youtube.com\sw33tzshortz
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around August 27th 2011
Summary: We saw 7 or 8 red-orange lights travel in the same direction into clouds
